## User.refreshToken property

Refresh token used to reauthenticate the user. Avoid using this directly and prefer [User.getIdToken()](./auth-types.user.getidtoken.md) to refresh the ID token instead.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly refreshToken: string;
```
